featured.text: What was Shaw trying to say to Churchill on his card? (A) Churchill should not go to the play alone.
It is said that the playwright once sent Churchill two tickets for the opening night of one of his plays, together with a card, which said, “Bring a friend (if you have one).”
Churchill, however, managed to get the better of this exchange.
Why didn’t Churchill want the tickets for the first night?

definition.zh_def: 邱吉爾，英國政治家，曾任英國首相，以其在第二次世界大戰期間的領導而聞名。
definition.en_def: Churchill, a British politician who served as Prime Minister, known for his leadership during World War II.
definition.example: Winston Churchill delivered inspiring speeches that rallied the British people during the war.
